alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe; Denver (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 3:46PM MDT until May 04 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... Denver County in northeastern Colorado... Central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 345 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm with little to no lightning was located over western Aurora, or 7 miles east of Denver, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Denver, Aurora, eastern Lakewood, Centennial, southern Commerce City, northeastern Littleton, Englewood, Greenwood Village, Lone Tree, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Sheridan, Bennett, Manila Village, Arapahoe Park, Watkins and Buckley SFB. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
